definition: to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: A flat-rate party line with two subscribers.

sentences.english: One Flat rate residential phone line.
sentences.chinese: 一種包月制住宅電話線。

definition: to cancel (a booking)/to unsubscribe (from a newsletter etc)
hotel room with one double (or queen or king) bed
abbr. for 標準間|标准间[biao1 zhun3 jian1], standard (hotel) room
to place an order/to book ahead
set meal/product or service package (e.g. for a cell phone subscription)
